name: Steam Out
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world where humanity is long gone, you control a lost particle of steam with some strange powers. You must find a way to escape this prison of metal and come back to the surface. Good Luck!

WARNING: The WebGL build has some minor audio scratching issues (We spent 4 hours searching without success). To avoid it. Download the ZIP file!

Also, feel free to leave feedback and have a wonderful day!
